column4: Is there a way to set the sensitivity and acceleration of my mouse separately from my touch pad?  That is to say I want to have on sensitivity for my physical mouse and another for my laptop's integrated touchpad.
AFAICT, that sets the same sensitivity for both mice.
there is no easy way to do what you want. but it has been requested. https://wiki.ubuntu.com/X/Config/Input is a good place to get started
